content: this legal case involves two parties but their names are not mentioned the case is about a legal procedure regarding costs in a court case the court has made a decision regarding the costs involved with the plaintiff being awarded 435691 eur the court has also made a judgment on various assets including a house vehicles furniture and other items the division of these assets is determined with the plaintiff receiving 60 and the defendant receiving 40 the court of appeal has dismissed the appeal made by the applicant and has ordered the defendant to reimburse the applicant with 435691 eur for the costs of the review proceedings the court has determined that a property is coowned by the former spouses the supreme court has partially upheld the revision and remitted the case back to the higher court for a new trial regarding the declaration of a specific real estate parcel the court of appeal has dismissed the appellants arguments and upheld the previous judgment the court has awarded costs to the claimant which the defendant must pay within 15 days the court has found that the purchase price of a flat was used to purchase the disputed property the court has also addressed alleged procedural errors but found that the relevant facts were correctly established

metadata.CASE_ID: Sodba Višjega sodišča v Ljubljani II Cp 1748/2021, 9. 2. 2022
